title: Three Stooges Treasure Hunt Hijinks
description: Join Larry, Moe, and Curly, those comedy icons, as they search for a secret treasure. Stay one step ahead of their dastardly landlord, Mr. G. Reedy while hunting for clues in a variety of levels. Relive the hilarious antics of the The Three Stooges, inspired by classic in-game shorts and movies. Can you brave the follies of this famous TV trio? Scour scenes in this Hidden Object saga, and hang with your best buds, The Three Stooges.
